helloldap.logging_tools¶

Tools to setup and help with logging.

class helloldap.logging_tools.UTCFormatter(fmt=None, datefmt=None, style='%')[source]¶

Bases: logging.Formatter

Helper class to set all logged timestamps to UTC.

converter()¶
gmtime([seconds]) -> (tm_year, tm_mon, tm_mday, tm_hour, tm_min,
tm_sec, tm_wday, tm_yday, tm_isdst)

Convert seconds since the Epoch to a time tuple expressing UTC (a.k.a. GMT). When ‘seconds’ is not passed in, convert the current time instead.

If the platform supports the tm_gmtoff and tm_zone, they are available as attributes only.

helloldap.logging_tools.format_request(request)[source]¶

Formats some request properties like in the access log.

Template is:

"{method} {url} HTTP/{version.major}.{version.minor}"
Parameters:request – Instance of a request.
Returns:Formatted string
helloldap.logging_tools.setup_logging(lgg, rc)[source]¶

Configures logging according to settings given in rc.

Adjusts log level of given logger according to verbosity required by rc.

Parameters:
  • lgg – Instance of a logger (e.g. root logger of this app)
  • rc – Dict with settings
